BoardGame:PlaceholderPotion.NAME: Placeholder Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose

BoardGame:BGAttackPotion.NAME: Attack Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: The next Attack you play this turn is played twice.

BoardGame:BGAncientPotion.NAME: Ancient Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove all #yWeak and #yVulnerable from your character.

BoardGame:BGElixirPotion.NAME: Elixir
DESCRIPTIONS: #yExhaust up to #b3 cards in your hand.

BoardGame:BGFairyPotion.NAME: Fairy in a Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, heal to #b2 HP instead and discard this potion.

BoardGame:BGGhostInAJar.NAME: Ghost in a Jar
DESCRIPTIONS: You can't lose more than #b1 HP this turn.

BoardGame:BGSkillPotion.NAME: Skill Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: The next Skill you play this turn is played twice.

BoardGame:BGSneckoOil.NAME: Snecko Oil
DESCRIPTIONS: cards. Put 2 Dazed on top of your draw pile.
